title: Wanindu Hasaranga : SLC official update
content: Wanindu Hasaranga, who was in isolation after contracting Covid-19, has once again, returned a positive result when a Rapid Antigen Test (RAT) was conducted on the player yesterday (22nd February).A PCR test too confirmed the result.He was first found to be positive during a Rapid Antigen Test (RAT) conducted on the 15th February 2022.The player was transferred to Melbourne from Canberra and will remain in isolation until he returns a negative PCR Test Report.
